text: The China women's national under-20 volleyball team represents China in women's under-20 volleyball Events, it is controlled and managed by the Chinese Volleyball Association that is a member of Asian volleyball body Asian Volleyball Confederation (AVC) and the international volleyball body government the Federation Internationale de Volleyball (FIVB). ==Results== ===FIVB U20 World Championship=== Champions Runners up Third place Fourth place {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; |- !colspan=9|FIVB U20 World Championship Championship Information |- !Year !Round !Position ! ! ! ! ! !Squad |- bgcolor=silver | 1977 | Final | Runners- Up | | | | | |Squad |- | 1981 | | 5th place | | | | | |Squad |- bgcolor=cc9966 | 1985 | Semifinals | Third place | | | | | | Squad |- bgcolor=cc9966 | 1987 | Semifinals | Third place | | | | | |Squad |- | 1989 | | 5th place | | | | | | Squad |- bgcolor=9acdff | 1991 | Semifinals | 4th place | | | | | | Squad |- | 1993 | | 9th place | | | | | | Squad |- bgcolor=gold | 1995 | Final | 1st place | | | | | | Squad |- bgcolor=cc9966 | 1997 | Semifinals | Third place | | | | | | Squad |- bgcolor=9acdff | 1999 | Semifinals | 4th place | | | | | | Squad |- bgcolor=cc9966 | 2001 | Semifinals | Third place | | | | | | Squad |- bgcolor=silver | 2003 | Final | Runners-Up | | | | | |Squad |- bgcolor=cc9966 | 2005 | Semifinals | Third place | | | | | | Squad |- bgcolor=silver | 2007 | Final | Runners-Up | | | | | | Squad |- | 2009 | | 10th place | | | | | |Squad |- bgcolor=cc9966 | 2011 | Semifinals | Third place | | | | | | Squad |- bgcolor=gold | 2013 | Final | 1st place | | | | | | Squad |- | 2015 | | 9th place | | | | | | Squad |- bgcolor=gold | 2017 | Final | 1st place | | | | | | Squad |- !Total !! 3 Titles !!19/19 !!—!!—!!—!!—!!—!!— |} ==Team== ===Current Squad=== The following is the Chinese roster in the 2017 FIVB Volleyball Women's U20 World Championship.
